item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 28, 2024 at 3:00 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Malware can turn off webcam LED and record video, demonstrated on ThinkPad X230 (396 points | 256 comments)
2. Dell is posting unsigned updates to their website which fail to install (10 points | discuss)
3. You can use C-Reduce for any language (275 points | 54 comments)
4. The Forgotten Story of How IBM Invented the Automated Fab (56 points | 9 comments)
5. Show HN: Feels Like Paper (145 points | 50 comments)
6. Show HN: TeaTime – distributed book library powered by SQLite, IPFS and GitHub (92 points | 21 comments)
7. RomCom exploits Firefox and Windows zero days in the wild (19 points | 7 comments)
8. QwQ: Alibaba's O1 Like Reasoning LLM (140 points | 85 comments)
9. MIT Aluminum Bicycle Project 1974 (30 points | 20 comments)

13. Structured Editing and Incremental Parsing (29 points | 4 comments)
14. Device-detector: Universal Device Detection library from User Agent (50 points | 10 comments)
15. Generate video sprites using just FFmpeg (44 points | 11 comments)
16. Developing a cancer drug without Big Pharma: this hospital shows it can be done (25 points | 1 comment)
17. Ultra-low-latency, batching and concurrent queue for IPC in Java (43 points | 17 comments)
18. Psychoacoustic and archeoacoustic nature of ancient Aztec skull whistles (45 points | 22 comments)
19. Ancient Sumerians created the first writing system (135 points | 145 comments)
20. Chebyshev Polynomials in the 16th Century (2022) (78 points | 26 comments)
21. Show HN: App that asks ‘why?’ every time you unlock your phone (652 points | 328 comments)
22. The Art and Mathematics of Genji-Ko (102 points | 6 comments)
23. Python type hints may not be not for me in practice (72 points | 132 comments)
24. Building a Harrison Wooden Longcase [pdf] (7 points | 3 comments)
25. Launch HN: Keep (YC W23) – AIOps and alert management (74 points | 28 comments)
26. London's 850-year-old food markets to close (90 points | 66 comments)
27. How Blackjack Works (2007) (51 points | 26 comments)
28. Brain learning differs fundamentally from artificial intelligence systems (106 points | 40 comments)
29. The capacitor that Apple soldered incorrectly at the factory (450 points | 185 comments)
30. Spotify has shut down several API endpoints (31 points | 10 comments)
